boorocks, 65-74 Male  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: Been using about 2 yrs. Pretty effective, but injections are painful at times. Think I 'blew out' 1 side when I upped the dose for better results. It's still a tricky proposition for me. Cialis & Viagra are still way too expensive for a fixed income.

column2: Willy, 65-74 Male  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: When You are diagnosed with Venous Leakage, there is not a lot that can be done, You can't maintain an erection more than a couple of Minutes, thats what I have, trimix extends the erection to about 5 to 7 min.

column2: zwxyz, 65-74 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Erection lasted 2hrs 15min before ejaculation then remained hard for maybe 30 minutes more. I have used Cialis, Levitra, and Viagra 100mg. The Viagra worked the best of the three for me. The only problem for me is storage (refrigerated) until use. I used 3.5 worked great. I weight 232.

column2: chris, 65-74 Male  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: Tri-mix works very well. It lasts for 1-2 hours. In the beginning I had some bruises. My doctor gave me slightly longer needles and it solved the problem.

column2: Poppa, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: I had terrible trouble the first 6 months. Bruising and meds not working. My Dr. retired. New Dr. gave me slightly longer needles. No problems since. I use Tri-Mix, 1-2 times a week.

column2: shootin up to get it up, 45-54 Male  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I have had good results up until I started teatment for allergies. The pharmacist says no interaction between allergy meds and phentolamine I am not convinced. I was using .1 but they said to increase I have had problems with penile pain also the injection is easier when I started using the autoject shot giver that my wife uses for her ms injections.

column2: Bill, 65-74 Male  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I was using a mix of Prostaglandin, Phentolamine and Papavarine (tri-mix) .03ml.very painful, penis swelled and throbing pain for almost 8 hrs. Pharmicist suggested trying mixture, leaving off prostaglandin as it has an alchol base which causes pain when injuected.  Will report later.

column2: LIMP  WEINER, 45-54 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: First injection left an incredible bruise.I was able to get an erection but not as good as I had hoped for.I will try again with a larger dose. I am injecting a compound of phentolamine/papavarine 0.1ml to 0.3ml wish me luck!!!
